title: Stunning views. Superb atmosphere. Stellar price.🌠
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
The Bay Tree Apartment Community of Los Gatos is tucked away in the foothills of the Santa Cruz Mountains.
Enjoy the small town feel coupled with rolling scenic views.
Choose among spacious one and two bedroom floor plans to call home.

Flush with luxury amenities such as modern cabinetry with designer fixtures, upgraded countertops, wood-grain finish floors, spacious closets, and oversized patios and balconies, Bay Tree offers stylish apartment living designed for progressive comfort.
Just two blocks from Old Town, life at Bay Tree will put you just a walk away from the area’s best dining, shopping, and entertainment.
Dogs and Cats Allowed: Residents are allowed a maximum of two pets per apartment.
A one-time security deposit and monthly rent fee ($75/dog and $50/cat) is required for each pet.
Please see a Leasing Associate for breed and weight restrictions.•$500 Deposit•$75 Monthly Pet Rent•$500 Fee•2 Pet Limit
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven
Hardwood floor, Granite countertop, Jacuzzi, Hot tub / Spa, Non-Smoking Property
